text: Ushasi Ray (); is a Bengali Television Actress. she is best Known for her lead role in Star Jalsha's Milon Tithi and Zee Bangla's Bokul Kotha. ==Notable Works== * Milon Tithi as Ahona (2015-2017) * Jay Kaali Kolkattawali * Bokul Kotha as Bokul (2017- Present) ==References== Category:Living people
title: Ushashi Ray
